mapper.select: SELECT prcs_dir_de_code, prcs_dir_code, prod_code, find_prod_name(prod_code) AS prod_name, prcs_plan_amt, prcs_dir_amt, prcs_start_de_date, prcs_end_de_date, find_cdnm('0S', prcs_ing_sts) AS prcs_ing_sts, emp_code, find_emp_name(emp_code) AS emp_name, re_dir_ck FROM prcs_dir_de WHERE prcs_dir_code = #{prcsDirCode} ORDER BY prcs_dir_de_code

SELECT DISTINCT p.prcs_plan_code, p.prcs_plan_name, p.prcs_plan_date, p.prcs_start_date, find_cdnm('0Z', d.prcs_prio) AS prcs_prio FROM prcs_plan p JOIN prcs_plan_de d ON p.prcs_plan_code = d.prcs_plan_code WHERE d.prcs_dir_sts = 'T1' ORDER BY p.prcs_plan_code DESC

SELECT d.prcs_plan_de_code, d.prod_code, find_prod_name(d.prod_code) AS prod_name, d.prcs_plan_amt FROM prcs_plan p JOIN prcs_plan_de d ON p.prcs_plan_code = d.prcs_plan_code WHERE d.prcs_plan_code = #{prcsPlanCode} AND d.prcs_dir_sts = 'T1' ORDER BY p.prcs_plan_code DESC

SELECT DISTINCT find_prod_name(v.prod_code) AS prod_name, find_prcs_name(v.prcs_code) AS prcs_name, mp_code, find_mat_name(v.mp_code) AS mat_name, v.bom_amt * #{prcsDirAmt} AS bom_amt, p.prcs_seq FROM v_mat_bom v RIGHT JOIN prcs_prod p ON v.prcs_code = p.prcs_code WHERE v.prod_code = #{prodCode} ORDER BY prcs_seq
